channel.title: Help with devolution
channel.description: hey, i downloaded ballscape source and i was trying to change the logout message (you know... when you have finished playing.....etc) and i couldn't find it!!! i've look all over the server help for a topic on this and can't find one that helps. so please can someone help me? I would like to change it to instead of saying 'runescape' to saying my server name.

item.title: Help with devolution
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

textHandler class, or if it’s not there, find the id for the text line.

Read full topic
